text: Ese (yewe Muhamadi) ntubona ko Allah agenza ibicu, hanyuma akabihuriza hamwe, maze akabigerekeranya nuko ukabona imvura ibimanukamo? Kandi (Allah) amanura urubura mu kirere (ruturutse) mu bicu bimeze nk’imisozi, akaruteza uwo ashaka ndetse akanarurinda uwo ashaka. Urumuri rw’imirabyo (ituruka mu kugongana kw’ibicu) ruba rwenda guhuma amaso
